attributes.action: Break up the First Bus monopoly in Portsmouth.
attributes.background: In March, First Bus Portsmouth significantly increased prices  without any clear notice. By operating a monopoly on many routes, they give working people little alternative but to pay their inflated fares. The Competition and Markets Authority should investigate and allow other firms to compete.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Bus services in Portsmouth are the responsibility of the local authority.

You could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find your local councillors here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
